text: Li Xian (; born 19 October 1991) is a Chinese actor. He has starred in many commercial films, variety shows and music videos. == Commercial film == {| class="wikitable" |- ! width=10|Year ! English title ! Chinese title ! Role ! Notes/Ref. |- | rowspan=2|2013 ||12 Years, we see it first || || Lin Xiaofeng || The movie is player-centric, combining the changes in the emotional mindset of the two players in the 12 years and the development of 17173 to perform a touching love song related to youth. And from the movie, we also see the development and changes of the entire game industry. It can be said that "12 Years" is not only a player's youth history, but also a micro-chronology of the Chinese game industry. |- |Confess || ||Li Qiao || The film tells the story of childhood friends "Sheng Li" and "Li Qiao" for fifteen years. Fifteen years of time is enough to allow emotions to settle. Some people come and go, and some are still around. We sigh for all the loss and changes in time, and we are grateful for every waiting with happiness. |- |2016 || Interstellar Gift || || Wang Qi || The film tells the story of astronaut Wang Qi played by Li Xian in 2025 driving the spacecraft to the Kemirer galaxy, separated from his girlfriend Siyu on the planet |- | 2018 || Explore Melbourne with Li Xian || || || Promotional film for Visit Victoria Campaign Launch Event |- | 2019 | Levi's | | | |- |2020 |Acqua di Parma | | |Acqua di Parma CF |- | 2020 | HONOR | The beauty of light and shadow, a moment of love-Glory 30 series | 光影之美，一瞬倾心——荣耀30系列 | Honor P30 Pro |- 2020 | JD.com | | | 520 edition |- |2020 |Gemice |揭秘李现的上头冰淇淋 | |Gemice CF |- |2020 |Somehow I Like You |茉茗我就喜欢你 | |Kang Shifu (Master Kong) Jasmine Tea Chinese Valentines' Day edition. |- |} == Variety Show == {| class="wikitable" |- ! width=10|Year ! Notes/Ref. |- | 2013 || "Singing When We Are Young" || || Zhang Hanyun & Cao Xuanbin || Footage of the scene from the movie with the same name. |- | rowspan=2|2015 || "I Am Jiang Xiaobai" || || Zhang Qi || In the MV, the "urban white-collar" Xiao Xianrou (Li Xian) bravely breaks through the shackles of reality, rides a locomotive to carry love, and pursues a simple and free life |- |"Medals" || || Lu Han || The MV tells 7 life stories of a bystander's perspective, where Li Xian featured as a lonely boxer. |- | rowspan="4" |2019 |"A Nameless Generation" |无名之辈 |Chen Xueran | rowspan="3" |Li as Han Shan Yang on "Go Go Squid!" |- |"Milk and Bread" |牛奶面包 |Yang Zi |- |"For Future" |給未來 |Li Xian |- |"A Glorious Future" |前程似锦 |Li Xian feat Chen Linong |Li as Bao Shishan on Red Fox Scholar |- |2020 | "Wuhan How Are You" | | Chang Shilei, Doudou and Zhu Yilong | Li with 50 other celebrities; some of them the biggest names in China, Hong Kong, and Taiwan, such as Donnie Yen, Li Bingbing, Zhao Wei, Zhou Xun, Alan Tam, Jackie Chan, Nicholas Tse, and Jay Chou voiced their support for frontline medical workers. Footage of the stars are interspersed with heart-rending clips of medical personnel working courageously and tirelessly through the outbreak. |} ==References==
